name: nuclide-debugger-hhvm
description: Allows Debugging of hhvm from Nuclide

scriptRegex.title: Script Path Filter Regexp
scriptRegex.description: Regular expression to filter connection script path.

idekeyRegex.title: Connection IDE Key Regexp
idekeyRegex.description: Regular expression to filter connection idekey. Usually your OS user id.

xdebugAttachPort.title: DBGP Attach Port
xdebugAttachPort.description: Port for DBGP connection to HHVM running in server mode.

xdebugLaunchingPort.title: DBGP Launch Port
xdebugLaunchingPort.description: Port for DBGP connection to HHVM used for launching scripts.

phpRuntimePath.title: Path to your PHP runtime
phpRuntimePath.description: Path to the PHP runtime on your server.

logLevel.title: Log Level
logLevel.description: Specify that level of logging from debugger, supported values: ALL | TRACE | DEBUG | INFO | WARN | ERROR | FATAL | OFF.

nuclide-debugger-hhvm-service.description: Debugger backend for remote hhvm processes.
